metadata.title: CVE-2017-0670 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: A denial of service vulnerability in the Android framework. Product:Android. Versions: 5.0.2, 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2. Android ID:A-36104177.

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
android-framework-23: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
